name: Work & Internship Experience
description: I've worked with startups & companies as a freelancer & intern

experienceDescription: I created a lot of beautiful components using react, nextjs, and scss to make the product more user friendly
I developed components that directly interface with the backend APIs using tables and charts in dashboard pages
Throughout the internship, I have gained a lot of knowledge and made several valuable contributions.
As a mentor for GirlScript Summer of Code 2024 (#GSSoC2024), My role is to provide guidance, support, and encouragement to participating students throughout their open source development journey.
I manage the design & development of the community website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.
As a contributor, I dove into open-source projects, collaborated with developers, & made impactful contributions to coding initiatives.
I have also changed the UI of the website
